member.name: ITfTextInputProcessor.Activate
member.summary: Activates a text service when a user session starts.
member.param: Pointer to the interface for the thread manager that owns the text service.
Specifies the client identifier for the text service.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ITfTextInputProcessor.Deactivate
member.summary: Deactivates a text service when a user session ends.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ITfTextInputProcessor
member.summary: The ITfTextInputProcessor interface is implemented by a text service and used by the TSF manager to activate and deactivate the text service. The manager obtains a pointer to this interface when it creates an instance of the text service for a thread with a call to .
